front.title: IEEE Standard for Software Quality Assurance Processes

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Requirements for initiating, planning, controlling, and executing the Software Quality Assurance processes of a software development or maintenance project are established in this standard. This standard is harmonized with the software life cycle process of ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2008 and the information content requirements of ISO/IEC/IEEE 15289:2011.
